titleInfo.title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - #163 - WSM

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: First recording contains excerpts of various Aunt Jemima jingles, plugs, and performances by Tommy Sosebee (performer), the Beasley Sisters (performers), and Louis Buck (announcer). Second Recording contains various cut-ins and Mother's Best plugs by Hank Williams and Louis Buck. Third recording is of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), Don Helms (performer) and Jerry Rivers (performer), listed as show #163 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
